Among the heathen are those who worship God ignorantly, those to whom the light is never brought by human instrumentality, yet they will not perish. 
                                                                           219
Though ignorant of the written law of God, they have heard His voice speaking to them in nature, and have done the things that the law required. Their works are evidence that the Holy Spirit has touched their hearts, and they are recognized as the children of God.
